post.description: Issues a token that can be used by client applications

parameters.name: x-hash
parameters.description: A hashed value using the content string 'aUa&&XUQBJXz2x&' and the secret key hashed using hmac(SHA-256). Ex) hash_hmac('sha256', 'aUa&&XUQBJXz2x&', [apiSecret])

scope.description: The scope of the access token. Available options are 'ad_agent', 'distributor', or 'backup_util'

identifier.description: An optional identifying name for the token

200.description: On success, an access token and refresh token will be issued

access_token.description: The access token, in JWT format

expiry_time.description: The expiry time of the access token

get.description: Gets all organizations belonging to the distributor.

patch.description: Cancels an organization. Users will no longer be able to log in to a cancelled organization.

post.description: Creates a new organization that is tied to the distributor.

distributor_reference.description: A unique reference identifier for this organization

country_id.description: The country ID of the organization

region.description: The country region where the organization is

city.description: The city where the organization is

email.description: The email of the primary contact / initial user

first_name.description: The first name of the primary contact / initial user

last_name.description: The last name of the primary contact / initial user

get.description: Searches for organizations that belongs to the distributor based on name, contact, or email.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Organization name, contact name, or email address

get.summary: Gets the details of an organization
get.description: Gets the details of an organization

patch.description: Gets the details of an organization

get.description: Gets the organization features that have been enabled for the given organization

get.summary: Gets user licences and usage for organization
get.description: Gets the user licences and usage for the given organization

parameters.name: site_users
parameters.description: Number of site users to add

parameters.name: site_users
parameters.description: Number of site users to remove

parameters.name: pro_users
parameters.description: Number of pro users to add

parameters.name: site_users
parameters.description: Number of pro users to remove

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price of the feature (Distributor Only)

parameters.name: seats
parameters.description: The number of user seats for the feature (Distributor Only)

delete.summary: Remove a feature from the organization
delete.description: Remove a feature from the organization

post.summary: Updates the credit card information for an organization
post.description: Updates the credit card information for an organization

cvc.description: The security number on the back of the card

name.description: The name that appears on the credit card

post.summary: Sets billing data for an organization (Distributor only)
post.description: Sets the billing data for an organization. This route is currently only usable for distributors modifying distributee accounts

requestBody.description: New organization billing data. All fields are optional.

package_price.description: The package price without docs enabled

pro_seats.description: The number of included pro users

docs_pro_price.description: The price of pro user overages if docs is enabled

docs_trial.description: The number of trial months for docs

threshold_users.description: The number of users that the organization can have before they lose their discount (no discount if set to 0)

threshold_discount.description: The discount that gets applied to the organization's package price if they are under their user threshold

threshold_docs_discount.description: The discount that gets applied to the docs price if they are under their user threshold

site_trial.description: The number of trial months for site

blink_trial.description: The number of trial months for blink

discount_expires.description: The date the discount expires (in the format: YYYY-MM-DD)

suspend_billing.description: The number of months to exclude the org from recieving invoices

contact.description: The name of the primary contact for the organization

email.description: The email of the primary contact for the organization

session_timeout.description: Time in minutes that the session is active for

trusted_location_timeout.description: Time in minutes that the session is active for in trusted locations

package_price.description: The package price without docs enabled

pro_seats.description: The number of included pro users

docs_pro_price.description: The price of pro user overages if docs is enabled

docs_trial.description: The number of trial months for docs

threshold_users.description: The number of users that the organization can have before they lose their discount (no discount if set to 0)

threshold_discount.description: The discount that gets applied to the organization's package price if they are under their user threshold

threshold_docs_discount.description: The discount that gets applied to the docs price if they are under their user threshold

site_trial.description: The number of trial months for site

blink_trial.description: The number of trial months for blink

discount_expires.description: The date the discount expires (in the format: YYYY-MM-DD)

suspend_billing.description: The number of months to exclude the org from recieving invoices
